mapper.select:
select count(ridingNo) as cnt from ridingBoard
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
mapper.insert: insert into ridingBoard(nickname, ridingSubject, ridingContent) values(#{nickname}, #{ridingSubject}, #{ridingContent})
mapper.update: update ridingBoard set ridingHit = ridingHit+1 where ridingNo=#{param1}
mapper.select: select ridingNo, nickname, ridingSubject, ridingContent, ridingHit, ridingWriteDate from ridingBoard where ridingNo=${param1}
mapper.update: update ridingBoard set ridingSubject=#{ridingSubject}, ridingContent=#{ridingContent} where ridingNo=#{ridingNo} and nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.delete: delete from ridingBoard where ridingNo=#{param1} and nickname=#{param2}
